name: Do U Copy? - Demo Version
description:
Do U Copy? (DUC?) is an VR co-op party game. DUC? puts players in unique and immersive situations where communication is key to win! In the first volume : Do U Copy? Vol.1 : It’s (Not) Payday, you’ll be immersed in a « not-so-typical » bank heist. Choose to play as the Thief (VR) or the Hacker (PC/Mobile) and cooperate with your ally to get the prized money! DUC? is a multiplayer coop game only at the moment.

Do U Copy? is a VR co-op game for friends, family and couples who  wants to put their communication skills to the test.

In Do U Copy? Vol.1 : it’s (not) payday play as the Thief and make
your way through one of the (least) secured banks in the country.
Avoid traps, guards and camera using your VR legs and the guidance of your « guy-in-the-chair ».

Or play as the Hacker, become the eyes and ears of the operations
through your phone, tablet or laptop!

Using your (un)realistic skills, hack through the bank securities, guide
your ally and solve engaging puzzles with unexpected turns !

Do U Copy is currently supported across these platforms : 

VR

- Oculus Quest / Quest 2 (Heist)

-Oculus Rift / Rift S / Quest with Link

- SteamVR headsets

Flat (Hacker)

- Android (.apk)

- PC (Windows)

Need more details ? Check out our manual (https://gravel-tungsten-7d0.notion.site/How-To-Play-39c001814e8c4c43b0a3cf176b47...) or join the Discord (bit.ly/joinDUC)

Have fun!
